Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

css:
<style type="text/css">@media screen {
	.print-format-gutter {
		background-color: #ddd;
		padding: 15px 0px;
	}
	.print-format {
		background-color: white;
		box-shadow: 0px 0px 9px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
		max-width: 8.3in;
		min-height: 11.69in;
		padding: 0.15in;
	    margin: auto;
	}

	.page-break {
		padding: 30px 0px;
		border-bottom: 1px dashed #888;
	}

	.page-break:first-child {
		padding-top: 0px;
	}

	.page-break:last-child {
		border-bottom: 0px;
	}

	/* mozilla hack for images in table */
	body:last-child .print-format td img {
		width: 100% !important;
	}
}

@media print {
	.print-format p {
		margin-left: 1px;
		margin-right: 1px;
	}
/*prevent table split hack*/
table tbody tr td:before,
    table tbody tr td:after {
        content : "" ;
        height : 4px ;
        display : block ;
    }
}

.pdf-variables,
.pdf-variable,
.visible-pdf {
	display: none !important;
}

.print-format {
	font-size: 9pt;
	font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Open Sans", sans-serif;
	-webkit-print-color-adjust:exact;
}

.page-break {
	page-break-after: always;
}

.print-heading {
	border-bottom: 2px solid #aaa;
	margin-bottom: 2px;
}

.print-heading h2 {
	margin: 0px;
}
.print-heading h4 {
	margin-top: 5px;
}

table.no-border, table.no-border td {
	border: 0px;
}

.print-format label {
	/* wkhtmltopdf breaks label into multiple lines when it is inline-block */
	display: block;
}

.print-format img {
	max-width: 100%;
}

.print-format table td > .primary:first-child {
	font-weight: bold;
}

.print-format td, .print-format th {
	vertical-align: top !important;
	padding: 2px !important;
}

.print-format p {
	margin: 2px 0px 2px;
}

table td div {
	/* needed to avoid partial cutting of text between page break in wkhtmltopdf */
	page-break-inside: avoid !important;
}

/* hack for webkit specific browser */
@media (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio:0) {
	thead, tfoot { display: table-row-group; }
}

[document-status] {
	margin-bottom: 5mm;
}.print-heading {
	text-align: right;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	font-color: #888;
	font-weight: bold;
	padding-bottom: 7px;
	margin-bottom:5px;
	border-bottom: 3px solid #aaa;
}

.print-format table.table-bordered {
	border-top: 2px solid #aaa;
}

.print-format th {
	background-color: #eee !important;
}</style>

css:
<style type="text/css">@media screen {
	.print-format-gutter {
		background-color: #ddd;
		padding: 15px 0px;
	}
	.print-format {
		background-color: white;
		box-shadow: 0px 0px 9px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
		max-width: 8.3in;
		min-height: 11.69in;
		padding: 0.75in;
	    margin: auto;
	}

	.page-break {
		padding: 30px 0px;
		border-bottom: 1px dashed #888;
	}

	.page-break:first-child {
		padding-top: 0px;
	}

	.page-break:last-child {
		border-bottom: 0px;
	}

	/* mozilla hack for images in table */
	body:last-child .print-format td img {
		width: 100% !important;
	}
}

@media print {
	.print-format p {
		margin-left: 1px;
		margin-right: 1px;
	}
}

.pdf-variables,
.pdf-variable,
.visible-pdf {
	display: none !important;
}

.print-format {
	font-size: 9pt;
	font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Open Sans", sans-serif;
	-webkit-print-color-adjust:exact;
}

.page-break {
	page-break-after: always;
}

.print-heading {
	border-bottom: 2px solid #aaa;
	margin-bottom: 2px;
}

.print-heading h2 {
	margin: 0px;
}
.print-heading h4 {
	margin-top: 5px;
}

table.no-border, table.no-border td {
	border: 0px;
}

.print-format label {
	/* wkhtmltopdf breaks label into multiple lines when it is inline-block */
	display: block;
}

.print-format img {
	max-width: 100%;
}

.print-format table td > .primary:first-child {
	font-weight: bold;
}

.print-format td, .print-format th {
	vertical-align: top !important;
	padding: 2px !important;
}

.print-format p {
	margin: 2px 0px 2px;
}

table td div {
	/* needed to avoid partial cutting of text between page break in wkhtmltopdf */
	page-break-inside: avoid !important;
}

/* hack for webkit specific browser */
@media (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio:0) {
	thead, tfoot { display: table-row-group; }
}

[document-status] {
	margin-bottom: 5mm;
}.print-heading {
	text-align: right;
	text-transform: uppercase;
	font-color: #888;
	font-weight: bold;
	padding-bottom: 7px;
	margin-bottom:5px;
	border-bottom: 3px solid #aaa;
}

.print-format table.table-bordered {
	border-top: 3px solid #aaa;
}

.print-format th {
	background-color: #eee !important;
}</style>
